Mr. and Mrs. Alan W. Haber of New York have announced the engagement of their daughter, Melanie Beth Haber, to Dr. Gerald Brett Weiss, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Harry H. Weiss of Kingston, Pa. A May wedding is planned.

Miss Haber, 32, is a graphic designer and computer graphics consultant in New York. She graduated from Vassar College. Her father is a vice president at Shearson Lehman Brothers, the brokerage company, in New York.

Dr. Weiss, 33, graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pittsburgh, where he was elected to Phi Beta Kappa and from which he received his M.D. He will join a practice as a neurologist in Yuma, Ariz. His parents, now retired, owned the Weiss Market, a supermarket in Nanticoke, Pa.
